title: Government's immunities
context: [ยง135-4] Government&rsquo;s immunities. The State and counties and their respective officers and employees shall not be liable for the death of, or injury to, persons or for damage to property, as a result of the use of an owner&rsquo;s real property for the diversion of vehicles, pedestrians, bicyclists, or a combination thereof, during an emergency or traffic accident, as provided in section 135-2. [L 1997, c 313, pt of ยง2]
